reviews.text: Just close down this station ! It's pointless to exist if every single day there is a cancelled or delayed trains to London Waterloo! People expecting trains on time but not with 30 mins delays every day. Late for work every single day because of false information on this station!
excellent station in the borough of Richmond

Mostly OK, strange how often a squadron of ticket inspectors are there making you feel uncomfortable. Invest in barriers, already. Really friendly staff at coffee place though. Jehovahs witnesses are there at the entrance talking amongst themselves so you don't get bothered.

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Whitton is located in the Whitton section of Twickenham, the station is served by Southwest Trains, Whitton is a nice station in a quiet neighbourhood, the station has a pretty nice entrance and it's been better since the works, it's clean and the air is clear. I don't see anything wrong with this station so I'll just leave it at that.
The station is so much better than before now that it has the lifts and the widened platforms. Much more pleasing to use.
